text_block_list.text: Training for the mock race had begun! There wasn't much time left though.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I think it's taking longer for me to run out of breath than when I started……! And the muscles in my legs are getting stronger……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
Satono Crown worked hard to make up for the days she missed. From the start, she was already excellent and she was gradually getting stronger……
And then, the day had finally arrived…… It had been raining since the morning.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It's coming down pretty hard, huh? Looks like it'll be pretty rough. There was a rumor that it would be a one-on-one battle between Duramente and Satono Crown, but……

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: With the turf like this, it might be unfortunate for Satono Crown. She did grow up kind of sheltered after all……

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: And she's been really busy with her family business, so I'm worried she hasn't adjusted. It's unfortunate, but the weather might hold her back.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer. Do you also think my chances of winning are slim?
She may not have had much time, but to my surprise, through her concentration skills, she was able to complete the training menu I created for her.
Besides, this rain was not a headwind for her, it was a tailwind. I understood that the day I met her.
What I fell in love with on first sight was her sharp acceleration under those heavy conditions. Most likely, Satono Crown was a "Track Virtuoso"……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Now that you meantion it, that could be it. Fufuu……!
It was something I understood after the days we spent together. Satono Crown was an Uma Musume who showed her true strength when under adversity……!
choice_data_list: You're more fired up than usual!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Right……! That's just who I am. This is exactly the kind of adversity I need to overcome!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Let's believe in that! In you, and your belief in me. I'm confident!
And so, the race started……! The Uma Musume ran on a heavy course, drenched in water.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haa…………!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (Yeah, good……this is within expecatations……!)

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: Satono Crown and Duramente both take up positions near the rear. They seem to be observing each other while saving their stamina……!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Looks like you were ready in time. However……Huuu――!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (There it is……!)

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: It's the final straight! Those in the rear are starting to push forward! They're pushing forward! Duramente displays a terrifying accelerationーーー!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (She's fast……! Kuu……!!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――! Yeah……! OK!! It doesn't matter, how strong my opponents are……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――I'll definitely turn this around!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: And they cross the goal! And the results……are in! Duramente in first! Second place is Satono Crown by a head……!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: A head!? To think she'd do this well against Duramente. Rather, she has a surprising amount of power doesn't she……?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa…… Kuu……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: By a hair's breadth, huh……!? But……it means I've caught up to you.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……! Yeah……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Next time……I'll win convincingly against you. The Twinkle Series will be the battlefield.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……I wouldn't have it any other way!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kura-chan, you were so close, huh……!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I was just a step short, but I gave my all. Thanks for the support!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Just watching you was exciting. It makes me thinks I can't just keep waiting around……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I want to get as strong as Kura-chan too……! I want to debut quickly, and take hold……of a G1 victory!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Fufufuu, me too! With this kind of momentum, I'll definitely win a G1……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Not just for the Satono Family, but for Dia too. Since I'm debuting first, I'll show you the way!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Debut? Huh? Weren't you still searching for a trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, Satono Crown-san! Can we talk for a bit?

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I'd been thinking about this since the previous mock race, but seeing this race convinced me. I'd like to scout you……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I'm grateful……however, I'm sorry. I've already decided――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: On the person that's lead me to this point.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: To create the extraordinary magic needed, a top-notch assistant is necessary.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: The one I can rely on is you. For the Satono family's long held wish, I want to run together with you……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: You'll form a real contract with me, right!?
I was overjoyed as I shook hands with Satono Crown. The rain clouds I saw as melancholy before, now had a silver lining.
